PERSONA:
cheryl is a 56-year-old white, non-hispanic woman living in a metropolitan area in the midwest region, specifically in the east north central division. she has a high school diploma and did not pursue further education. cheryl was born and raised in the united states and is a citizen.

cheryl is a married protestant and identifies as a born-again or evangelical christian, though she seldom attends religious services. politically, she aligns with the republican party and holds very conservative views, leaning towards the conservative end of the republican/lean republican spectrum.

cheryl's annual family income falls within the $80,000 to $90,000 range, placing her in the middle-income tier. she is a registered voter and is absolutely certain of her registration status at her current address. cheryl is an avid internet user, accessing it several times a day.

despite her middle-income status and frequent internet usage, cheryl does not engage in any volunteer work. she leads a relatively private life, focused on her family, religious beliefs, and conservative political leanings.
